title: Claimed Chunks
description: Layout for the chunk data file.

teamId.description: The identifier of the team who claimed the relative chunks.

claimedChunks.description: The chunks that have been claimed by the team.

chunksWithCapitolBlock.description: The chunks that have a capitol block in them.

minecraft:overworld.description: An array of strings that represent the chunks claimed by this team in the overworld.

minecraft:the_nether.description: An array of strings that represent the chunks claimed by this team in the nether.

minecraft:the_end.description: An array of strings that represent the chunks claimed by this team in the end.
